solution_line_template: The jar holds {multiplier_for_glass} * {sand_dollars_in_bag} = <<{multiplier_for_glass}*{sand_dollars_in_bag}={pieces_of_glass_in_jar}>>{pieces_of_glass_in_jar} pieces of glass.
